scripts.remove:reports: if exist cypress\reports (rd /s /q cypress\reports) else (echo Directory does not exist)
scripts.remove:archieve: if exist cypress\archive\ (rd /s /q cypress\archive\) else (echo Directory does not exist)
scripts.pretest: npm run remove:reports && npm run remove:archieve && npm run make:directories
scripts.test: npm run scripts && npm run archive-report
